__init__(self, val=0, next=None):\r\n#         self.val = val\r\n#         self.next = next\r\n\r\ndef reverseList(head: Optional[ListNode]) -> Optional[ListNode]:\r\n    curr = head\r\n    stack = []\r\n    reversed_list = None\r\n    \r\n    while curr:\r\n        reversed_list = ListNode(curr.val, reversed_list)\r\n        stack.append(reversed_list)\r\n        curr = curr.next\r\n        \r\n    return
